FuncDef:
The cmu-alarm command sets the level for a device-level CMU alarm.
The undo cmu-alarm command cancels the level for a device-level CMU alarm.
By default, no cmu-alarm is configured.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the level of a device-level CMU alarm.
The value is 0 or 1.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The device provides the environment monitoring function to monitor the environment change. In this case, the maintenance personnel do not need to implement on-site environment monitoring. When detecting the environment change, the device reports an alarm to the NMS. The maintenance personnel can then adjust environment parameters accordingly. This can effectively reduce the maintenance expenditure of the equipment room.
In addition, the same ID can be configured for alarms of the same type that are generated by the device.
Precautions
This command is applicable only to the device equipped with the CMU module.
Alarm information to be reported, such as the alarm reporting list and alarm severity, needs to be customized in software based on customer requirements. In the current version, only hardware is designed to support this function.
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
